text: So are you looking at trying to fill in some areas on the steps that dry out before the main pour happens? Might be good to look at having more water at the top of the steps in the preroll. What are your thoughts on next steps?

I’m trying to prevent the steps from becoming overfilled and just rushing over the stairs. Though the holes should fill themselves in time. I made a breakthrough this morning by actually reducing how quickly the points are added at the top. Once I get this right I’ve already added a sink on the far left of the ground to keep the fluid from growing to large.
